Package src.scanner

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Token
    This is an interface used to classify all the classes ending in "Token".
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoolToken
    The class constructor takes a string as input.
    CommentToken
    The class constructor takes a string as input.
    EOFToken
    The class constructor takes no input It is used to represent the end of the file stream It implements the Token interface, requiring a toString() method.
    IdentifierToken
    The class constructor takes a string as input.
    IntToken
    The class constructor takes a string as input.
    KeywordToken
    The class constructor a string as input.
    OpToken
    The class constructor takes a character as input.
    PunctuationToken
    The class constructor takes a character as input.
    Scanner
    This class serves as a state machine.
    TerminatorToken
    The class constructor takes a character as input.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ScanException
    This class extends the Exception class.
